description: The generation process is the same as for Intent Extraction and Assessment Docs. First, we put the desired elements into the basket, then click the "Schedule Query Generation" button on the basket page, select the LLM there, and set the parameters. For generation, the documents are first downloaded, then split into fragments, then each fragment is sent to the LLM where queries are generated for it, and then from the resulting large set of queries, ten most relevant to the document are selected.
